snippet.title: Kakuro Blend trailer
snippet.description:
Kakuro Blend is exactly like the Japanese puzzle, Kakuro, but with colors instead of numbers. Each puzzle contains a grid with initially empty squares and colorful triangles. The goal is to fill the squares to the right or below the triangles, so they mix to create the color within their respective triangles. These puzzles are designed to be difficult, with some mixed colors looking exactly alike but having different answers. Kakuro Blend includes 40 increasingly challenging levels, from 6×6 to 15×10, and 8 different color palettes that change up the game slightly so the player doesn’t get used to the same mixtures. Kakuro Blend is simple, colorful, and challenging. If you enjoy tough puzzles, this game will satisfy you for hours.

Demo is available on Windows at https://oglankyboi.itch.io/kakuro-blend-demo and https://kakuroblend.wordpress.com/. Let me know what you think, I love feedback!

Full game available for Windows on Steam and Itch.io starting March 15th, 2021.
